files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.docstates

# Build results

[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]elease32/
[Rr]elease64/
x64/
build/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
.vs/
Application/

#NuGet
packages/

# Enable "build/" folder in the NuGet Packages folder since NuGet packages use it for MSBuild targets
!packages/*/build/

# MSTest test Results
[Tt]est[Rr]esult*/
[Bb]uild[Ll]og.*

*_i.c
*_p.c
*.ilk
*.meta
*.obj
*.pch
*.pdb
*.pgc
*.pgd
*.rsp
*.sbr
*.tlb
*.tli
*.tlh
*.tmp
*.tmp_proj
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
.builds
*.pidb
*.log
*.scc

# Visual C++ cache files
ipch/
*.aps
*.ncb
*.opensdf
*.sdf
*.cachefile

# Visual Studio profiler
*.psess
*.vsp
*.vspx

# Guidance Automation Toolkit
*.gpState

# ReSharper is a .NET coding add-in
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper

# TeamCity is a build add-in
_TeamCity*

# DotCover is a Code Coverage Tool
*.dotCover

# NCrunch
*.ncrunch*
.*crunch*.local.xml

# Installshield output folder
[Ee]xpress/

# DocProject is a documentation generator add-in
DocProject/buildhelp/
DocProject/Help/*.HxT
DocProject/Help/*.HxC
DocProject/Help/*.hhc
DocProject/Help/*.hhk
DocProject/Help/*.hhp
DocProject/Help/Html2
DocProject/Help/html

# Click-Once directory
publish/

# Publish Web Output
*.Publish.xml

# NuGet Packages Directory
## TODO: If you have NuGet Package Restore enabled, uncomment the next line
#packages/

# Windows Azure Build Output
csx
*.build.csdef

# Windows Store app package directory
AppPackages/

# Others
sql/
*.Cache
ClientBin/
[Ss]tyle[Cc]op.*
~$*
*~
*.dbmdl
*.[Pp]ublish.xml
*.pfx
*.publishsettings

# RIA/Silverlight projects
Generated_Code/

# Backup & report files from converting an old project file to a newer
# Visual Studio version. Backup files are not needed, because we have git ;-)
_UpgradeReport_Files/
Backup*/
UpgradeLog*.XML
UpgradeLog*.htm

# SQL Server files
App_Data/*.mdf
App_Data/*.ldf


#LightSwitch generated files
GeneratedArtifacts/
_Pvt_Extensions/
ModelManifest.xml

# =========================
# Windows detritus
# =========================

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Mac desktop service store files
.DS_Store

files.name: README.md
files.content:
# SmartSystemMenu
üåè: [**English**](/) [–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π](/README_RU.md) [‰∏≠ÊñáÁâà](/README_CN.md) --- SmartSystemMenu extends system menu of all windows in the system. It appends next custom items to menu: * **Information.** Shows a dialog with information of the current window and process: the window handle, the window caption, the window style, the window class, the process name, the process id, the path to the process. * **Hide.** Allows to hide the current window. * **Roll Up.** Allows to roll up and down the current window. * **Aero Glass.** Allows to add the "Aero Glass" blur to the current window. (Windows Vista and higher. Mostly for console windows.) * **Always On Top.** Allows the current window to stay on top of all other windows. * **Change Title.** Allows to change the text in the title bar. * **Send To Bottom.** Allows to send to bottom the current window. * **Save Screenshot.** Allows to save the current window screenshot in a file. * **Open File In Explorer.** Allows to open a process file in a File Explorer. * **Drag By Mouse.** Allows to drag by mouse the current window. * **Click Through.** Allows to click through the current window. * **Hide For Alt+Tab.** Allows to hide the current window for the Taskbar and Alt+Tab switch. * **Resize.** Allows to change the size of the current window. * **Move To.** Allows to move the current window to another monitor. * **Alignment.** Allows the current window to be aligned with any of the 9 positions on the desktop. * **Transparency.** Allows to change the transparency of the current window. * **Priority.** Allows to change the current window's program priority. * **Clipboard.** Allows to copy all window texts (including console, ms office products, etc.) to clipboard and clear clipboard. * **Dimmer.** Dims all but the currently focused window. * **Buttons.** Allows to disable "Minimize", "Maximize" and "Close" button. * **System Tray.** Allows to minimize or suspend the current window to the system tray. * **Other Windows.** Allows to close and minimize all windows in the system except the current. * **Start Program.** Allows to start programs which is in the settings. Screenshots ------------------ ![Resize](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuEn1.png) ![Alignment](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuEn2.png) ![Transparency](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuEn3.png) ![Information](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuEn4.png) Command Line Interface -------------------- ```bash --help The help --title Title --titleBegins Title begins --titleEnds Title ends --titleContains Title contains --handle Handle (1234567890) (0xFFFFFF) --processId PID (1234567890) -d --delay Delay in milliseconds -l --left Left -t --top Top -w --width Width -h --height Height -i --information Information dialog -s --savescreenshot Save Screenshot -m --monitor [0, 1, 2, 3, ...] -a --alignment [topleft, topcenter, topright, middleleft, middlecenter, middleright, bottomleft, bottomcenter, bottomright, centerhorizontally, centervertically] -p --priority [realtime, high, abovenormal, normal, belownormal, idle] --transparency [0 ... 100] --alwaysontop [on, off] -g --aeroglass [on, off] --hidealttab [on, off] --clickthrough [on, off] --minimizebutton [on, off] --maximizebutton [on, off] --sendtobottom Send To Bottom -o --openinexplorer Open File In Explorer -c --copytoclipboard Copy Window Text To Clipboard --copyscreenshot Copy Screenshot To Clipboard --clearclipboard Clear Clipboard --trustedinstaller Sets TrustedInstaller owner for SmartSystemMenuHook.dll and SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll -n --nogui No GUI Example: SmartSystemMenu.exe --title "Untitled - Notepad" -a topleft -p high --alwaysontop on --nogui ``` Install -------------------- * Download the [SmartSystemMenu](https://github.com/AlexanderPro/SmartSystemMenu/releases) in the zip file * [Chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org/): `choco install smartsystemmenu` * [Scoop](https://scoop.sh/): `scoop bucket add extras` and `scoop install extras/smartsystemmenu` Requirements -------------------- * OS Windows XP SP3 and later. Supports x86 and x64 systems. * .NET Framework 4.0 Files -------------------- * SmartSystemMenu.exe * SmartSystemMenu64.exe (located in resources of SmartSystemMenu.exe module) * SmartSystemMenuHook.dll * SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll * SmartSystemMenu.xml * Language.xml This program has SmartSystemMenu.exe and SmartSystemMenuHook.dll modules for x86 processes, SmartSystemMenu64.exe and SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll modules for x64 processes. When you run SmartSystemMenu.exe, it also runs SmartSystemMenu64.exe. These two executable modules load hooks (SmartSystemMenuHook.dll and SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll) to all processes. When you select an item in the system menu, the hook sends a message to the executable module. After that, the module performs the selected action: changes the transparency of the window, changes the size of the window, etc. Tips -------------------- Run SmartSystemMenu.exe process. If your OS has enabled UAC, the system will display a UAC dialog. You do not need to worry because the program needs elevated privileges. After the program has been executed, in all system menus of all windows you can see custom items.

files.name: README_CN.md
files.content:
# SmartSystemMenu
üåè: [English](/) [–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π](/README_RU.md) [**‰∏≠ÊñáÁâà**](/README_CN.md) --- SmartSystemMenu Êâ©Â±ï‰∫ÜÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏≠ÊâÄÊúâÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÁ≥ªÁªüËèúÂçï„ÄÇ ÂÆÉ‰ºöÂ∞Ü‰∏ãÈù¢ÁöÑËá™ÂÆö‰πâÈ°πÁõÆËøΩÂä†Âà∞ËèúÂçï: * **ËØ¶ÁªÜ‰ø°ÊÅØ.** ÊòæÁ§∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂØπËØùÊ°ÜÔºåÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂåÖÂê´ÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÂíåËøõÁ®ãÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºöÁ™óÂè£Âè•ÊüÑ„ÄÅÁ™óÂè£Ê†áÈ¢ò„ÄÅÁ™óÂè£È£éÊ†º„ÄÅÁ™óÂè£Á±ª„ÄÅËøõÁ®ãÂêçÁß∞„ÄÅËøõÁ®ãID„ÄÅËøõÁ®ãË∑ØÂæÑ„ÄÇ * **ÈöêËóè.** ÂÖÅËÆ∏ÈöêËóèÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£„ÄÇ * **Âç∑Ëµ∑Á™óÂè£.** Â∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£Âêë‰∏äÂç∑Ëµ∑„ÄÇ * **ÊØõÁéªÁíÉÊïàÊûú.** Â∞Ü "ÊØõÁéªÁíÉÊïàÊûú" Ê®°Á≥äÊ∑ªÂä†Âà∞ÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£„ÄÇ(‰ªÖ Windows Vista ÂèäÊõ¥È´òÁâàÊú¨ÊîØÊåÅ„ÄÇ‰∏ªË¶ÅÁî®‰∫éÊéßÂà∂Âè∞Á™óÂè£„ÄÇ) * **Á™óÂè£ÂßãÁªàÁΩÆÈ°∂.** Â∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£‰øùÊåÅÂú®ÊâÄÊúâÂÖ∂‰ªñÁ™óÂè£‰πã‰∏ä„ÄÇ * **Êõ¥ÊîπÊ†áÈ¢ò.** ÂÖÅËÆ∏Êõ¥ÊîπÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÊ†áÈ¢ò„ÄÇ * **Á™óÂè£ÁΩÆÂ∫ï.** Â∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£‰øùÊåÅÂú®ÊâÄÊúâÂÖ∂‰ªñÁ™óÂè£‰πã‰∏ã„ÄÇ * **‰øùÂ≠òÁ™óÂè£Êà™Âõæ.** Â∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÂ±èÂπïÊà™Âõæ‰øùÂ≠òÂà∞Êñá‰ª∂‰∏≠„ÄÇ * **Âú®ËµÑÊ∫êÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®‰∏≠ËøõÂÖ•Á®ãÂ∫èË∑ØÂæÑ.** Âú®Êñá‰ª∂ËµÑÊ∫êÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®‰∏≠ÊâìÂºÄËøõÁ®ãÊñá‰ª∂„ÄÇ * **ÈÄöËøáÈº†Ê†áÊãñÂä®.** ÂÖÅËÆ∏ÈÄöËøáÈº†Ê†áÊãñÂä®ÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£„ÄÇ * **ÁÇπÂáªÊó∂Á©øËøáÁ™óÂè£.** ÂÖÅËÆ∏ÁÇπÂáªÁ©øÈÄèÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£„ÄÇ * **Âú® Alt+Tab ÂàóË°®‰∏≠ÈöêËóè.** ÂÖÅËÆ∏ÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£Âú®‰ªªÂä°Ê†èÂíå Alt+Tab ÂàáÊç¢‰∏≠ÈöêËóè„ÄÇ * **Ë∞ÉÊï¥Á™óÂè£Â§ßÂ∞èÂà∞.** Êõ¥ÊîπÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÂ§ßÂ∞è„ÄÇ * **ÁßªÂä®Âà∞.** Â∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÁßªÂä®Âà∞Âè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊòæÁ§∫Âô®„ÄÇ * **ÂØπÈΩêÁ™óÂè£Âà∞.** ÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£‰∏éÊ°åÈù¢‰∏äÁöÑ9‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰∏≠ÁöÑ‰ªª‰Ωï‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂØπÈΩê„ÄÇ * **ÈÄèÊòéÂ∫¶.** Êõ¥ÊîπÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÈÄèÊòéÂ∫¶„ÄÇ * **‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß.** Êõ¥ÊîπÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫è‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß„ÄÇ * **Ââ™Ë¥¥ÊùøÊìç‰Ωú.** Â§çÂà∂ÊâÄÊúâÁ™óÂè£ÊñáÊú¨ (ÂåÖÊã¨ÊéßÂà∂Âè∞„ÄÅMS Office ‰∫ßÂìÅÁ≠â) Âà∞Ââ™Ë¥¥Êùø‰∏≠ÔºåÂêåÊó∂ÊîØÊåÅÊ∏ÖÈô§Ââ™Ë¥¥Êùø„ÄÇ * **Á™ÅÂá∫Á™óÂè£Êìç‰Ωú.** ‰ΩøÈô§ÂΩìÂâçÁÑ¶ÁÇπÁ™óÂè£‰πãÂ§ñÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÁ™óÂè£ÂèòÊöó„ÄÇ * **ÊåâÈíÆÊìç‰Ωú.** ÂÖÅËÆ∏Á¶ÅÁî® "ÊúÄÂ∞èÂåñ" „ÄÅ "ÊúÄÂ§ßÂåñ" Âíå "ÂÖ≥Èó≠" ÊåâÈíÆ„ÄÇ * **Á≥ªÁªüÊâòÁõò.** Â∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£ÊúÄÂ∞èÂåñÊàñÊåÇËµ∑Âà∞Á≥ªÁªüÊâòÁõò„ÄÇ * **ÂÖ∂‰ªñÁ™óÂè£Êìç‰Ωú.** ÂÖ≥Èó≠ÂíåÊúÄÂ∞èÂåñÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏≠Èô§ÂΩìÂâçÁ™óÂè£‰πãÂ§ñÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÁ™óÂè£„ÄÇ * **ÂêØÂä®.** ÂêØÂä®ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏≠ÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫è„ÄÇ Êà™Âõæ ------------------ ![Resize](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuCn1.png) ![Alignment](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuCn2.png) ![Transparency](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuCn3.png) ![Information](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuCn4.png) ## ÂëΩ‰ª§Ë°åÊé•Âè£ ```bash --help The help --title Title --titleBegins Title begins --titleEnds Title ends --titleContains Title contains --handle Handle (1234567890) (0xFFFFFF) --processId PID (1234567890) -d --delay Delay in milliseconds -l --left Left -t --top Top -w --width Width -h --height Height -i --information Information dialog -s --savescreenshot Save Screenshot -m --monitor [0, 1, 2, 3, ...] -a --alignment [topleft, topcenter, topright, middleleft, middlecenter, middleright, bottomleft, bottomcenter, bottomright, centerhorizontally, centervertically] -p --priority [realtime, high, abovenormal, normal, belownormal, idle] --transparency [0 ... 100] --alwaysontop [on, off] -g --aeroglass [on, off] --hidealttab [on, off] --clickthrough [on, off] --minimizebutton [on, off] --maximizebutton [on, off] --sendtobottom Send To Bottom -o --openinexplorer Open File In Explorer -c --copytoclipboard Copy Window Text To Clipboard --copyscreenshot Copy Screenshot To Clipboard --clearclipboard Clear Clipboard --trustedinstaller Sets TrustedInstaller owner for SmartSystemMenuHook.dll and SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll -n --nogui No GUI Example: SmartSystemMenu.exe --title "Untitled - Notepad" -a topleft -p high --alwaysontop on --nogui ``` ## ÂÆâË£ÖÊñπÊ≥ï - ‰∏ãËΩΩ [SmartSystemMenu](https://github.com/AlexanderPro/SmartSystemMenu/releases) zip ÂéãÁº©ÂåÖÊñá‰ª∂ - [Chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org/): `choco install smartsystemmenu` - [Scoop](https://scoop.sh/): `scoop bucket add extras` and `scoop install extras/smartsystemmenu` Ë¶ÅÊ±Ç -------------------- * OS Windows XP SP3 ÂèäÊõ¥È´òÁâàÊú¨„ÄÇ ÊîØÊåÅ x86 Âíå x64 Á≥ªÁªü„ÄÇ * .NET Framework 4.0 Á®ãÂ∫èÊñá‰ª∂ -------------------- * SmartSystemMenu.exe * SmartSystemMenu64.exe (‰Ωç‰∫é SmartSystemMenu.exe Ê®°ÂùóÁöÑËµÑÊ∫ê‰∏≠) * SmartSystemMenuHook.dll * SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll * SmartSystemMenu.xml * Language.xml Ê≠§Á®ãÂ∫èÂÖ∑ÊúâÁî®‰∫é x86 ËøõÁ®ãÁöÑ SmartSystemMenu.exe Âíå SmartSystemMenuHook.dll Ê®°ÂùóÔºåÁî®‰∫é x64 ËøõÁ®ãÁöÑ SmartSystemMenu64.exe Âíå SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll Ê®°Âùó„ÄÇÂΩìÊÇ®ËøêË°å SmartSystemMenu.exe Êó∂ÔºåÂÆÉËøò‰ºöËøêË°å SmartSystemMenu64.exe„ÄÇ Ëøô‰∏§‰∏™ÂèØÊâßË°åÊ®°ÂùóÂ∞ÜÊåÇÈí© (SmartSystemMenuHook.dll Âíå SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll) Âä†ËΩΩÂà∞ÊâÄÊúâËøõÁ®ã„ÄÇ ÂΩìÊÇ®Âú®Á≥ªÁªüËèúÂçï‰∏≠ÈÄâÊã©‰∏ÄÈ°πÊó∂ÔºåÊåÇÈí©‰ºöÂêëÂèØÊâßË°åÊ®°ÂùóÂèëÈÄÅ‰∏ÄÊù°Ê∂àÊÅØ„ÄÇ‰πãÂêéÔºåÊ®°ÂùóÊâßË°åÈÄâÂÆöÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÔºöÊõ¥ÊîπÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÈÄèÊòéÂ∫¶„ÄÅÊõ¥ÊîπÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÂ§ßÂ∞èÁ≠âÁ≠â„ÄÇ ÊèêÁ§∫ -------------------- ËøêË°å SmartSystemMenu.exe ËøõÁ®ã„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®ÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÁ≥ªÁªüÂêØÁî®‰∫Ü UACÔºåÁ≥ªÁªüÂ∞ÜÊòæÁ§∫ UAC ÂØπËØùÊ°Ü„ÄÇÊÇ®‰∏çÂøÖÊãÖÂøÉÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Á®ãÂ∫èÈúÄË¶ÅÊèêÂçáÊùÉÈôê„ÄÇÁ®ãÂ∫èÊâßË°åÂêéÔºåÂú®ÊâÄÊúâÁ™óÂè£ÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÁ≥ªÁªüËèúÂçï‰∏≠ÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÈ°πÁõÆ„ÄÇ ## ÂÖ≥‰∫é‰∏≠ÊñáËØ≠Ë®Ä Âú®Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°ËøêË°å SmartSystemMenu.exe Êó∂Ôºå‰ºöËá™Âä®Ê£ÄÊµãÁ≥ªÁªüËØ≠Ë®ÄÁéØÂ¢ÉÔºåËã•‰∏∫ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠ÊñáÊàñÁπÅ‰Ωì‰∏≠ÊñáÔºåËá™Âä®Â∫îÁî®ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠ÊñáÊàñÁπÅ‰Ωì‰∏≠ÊñáËØ≠Ë®ÄÔºåÂêéÁª≠‰∫¶ÂèØËøõÂÖ•ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏≠‰øÆÊîπÊòæÁ§∫ËØ≠Ë®ÄÔºåÈáçÊñ∞ÂêØÂä®Â∫îÁî®ÂêéÁîüÊïà„ÄÇ

files.name: README_RU.md
files.content:
# SmartSystemMenu
üåè: [English](/) [**–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π**](/README_RU.md) [‰∏≠ÊñáÁâà](/README_CN.md) --- SmartSystemMenu –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—É–Ω–∫—Ç—ã —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ –º–µ–Ω—é, —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ –∫–∞–∫: * **–ò–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è.** –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥ —Å –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –æ–± –æ–∫–Ω–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–µ, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º—É –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∞–¥–ª–µ–∂–∏—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–æ. * **–°–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å –æ–∫–Ω–æ. * **–°–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å –≤–≤–µ—Ä—Ö.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å –≤–≤–µ—Ä—Ö –¥–æ –∑–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–∫–∞ –æ–∫–Ω–æ –∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω–æ. * **Aero Glass.** –í–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ—Ç –¥–ª—è —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–≥–æ –æ–∫–Ω–∞ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º "Aero Glass". (–ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤ Windows Vista and –≤—ã—à–µ. –£–¥–æ–±–Ω–æ –ø–æ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ–π —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–Ω—Å–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫–æ–Ω.) * **–ü–æ–≤–µ—Ä—Ö –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö.** –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–æ –ø–æ–≤–µ—Ä—Ö –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–∫–æ–Ω —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã. * **–ò–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫ –æ–∫–Ω–∞. * **–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å –≤–Ω–∏–∑.** –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–æ –∑–∞ –≤—Å–µ–º–∏ –æ–∫–Ω–∞–º–∏ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã. * **–°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Å–Ω–∏–º–æ–∫ –æ–∫–Ω–∞.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Å–∫—Ä–∏–Ω—à–æ—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–∞ –≤ —Ñ–∞–π–ª. * **–û—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–Ω–∏–∫–µ.** –û—Ç–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç File Explorer —Å –≤—ã–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º—É –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∞–¥–ª–µ–∂–∏—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–æ. * **–ü–µ—Ä–µ—Ç–∞—â–∏—Ç—å –º—ã—à–∫–æ–π.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ç–∞—â–∏—Ç—å –æ–∫–Ω–æ –º—ã—à–∫–æ–π –∑–∞ –ª—é–±—É—é –µ–≥–æ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç—å. * **–ö–ª–∏–∫ —Å–∫–≤–æ–∑—å –æ–∫–Ω–æ.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∫–ª–∏–∫ —Å–∫–≤–æ–∑—å –æ–∫–Ω–æ. * **–°–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å –¥–ª—è Alt+Tab.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å –æ–∫–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á –∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ Alt+Tab. * **–ò–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä –æ–∫–Ω–∞. * **–ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ–∫–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–π –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä. * **–í—ã—Ä–∞–≤–Ω–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –≤—ã—Ä–∞–≤–Ω–∏—Ç—å –æ–∫–Ω–æ –≤ –æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –∏–∑ 9 –ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–π. * **–ü—Ä–æ–∑—Ä–∞—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–∑—Ä–∞—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –æ–∫–Ω–∞. * **–ü—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º—É –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∞–¥–ª–µ–∂–∏—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–æ. * **–ë—É—Ñ–µ—Ä –æ–±–º–µ–Ω–∞.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å–∫–æ–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–∞ –≤ –±—É—Ñ–µ—Ä –æ–±–º–µ–Ω–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –æ—á–∏—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å –±—É—Ñ–µ—Ä –æ–±–º–µ–Ω–∞. * **–ó–∞—Ç–µ–º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ.** –ó–∞—Ç–µ–º–Ω—è–µ—Ç –º–æ–Ω–∏—Ç–æ—Ä, –∫—Ä–æ–º–µ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–∫–Ω–∞. * **–ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∏—Ç—å –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∏ –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∏—è –æ–∫–Ω–∞. * **–°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π —Ç—Ä–µ–π.** –°–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç –æ–∫–Ω–æ –≤ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π —Ç—Ä–µ–π. * **–î—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –æ–∫–Ω–∞.** –ü–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∑–∞–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å –∏–ª–∏ –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ –æ–∫–Ω–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã –∫—Ä–æ–º–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–≥–æ. * **–ü—É—Å–∫.** –ó–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ—Ç –ª—é–±–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –∑–∞–¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã. –°–∫—Ä–∏–Ω—à–æ—Ç—ã ------------------ ![Resize](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuRu1.png) ![Alignment](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuRu2.png) ![Transparency](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuRu3.png) ![Information](./SmartSystemMenu/Images/SmartSystemMenuRu4.png) –ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∫–∏ -------------------- ```bash --help The help --title Title --titleBegins Title begins --titleEnds Title ends --titleContains Title contains --handle Handle (1234567890) (0xFFFFFF) --processId PID (1234567890) -d --delay Delay in milliseconds -l --left Left -t --top Top -w --width Width -h --height Height -i --information Information dialog -s --savescreenshot Save Screenshot -m --monitor [0, 1, 2, 3, ...] -a --alignment [topleft, topcenter, topright, middleleft, middlecenter, middleright, bottomleft, bottomcenter, bottomright, centerhorizontally, centervertically] -p --priority [realtime, high, abovenormal, normal, belownormal, idle] --transparency [0 ... 100] --alwaysontop [on, off] -g --aeroglass [on, off] --hidealttab [on, off] --clickthrough [on, off] --minimizebutton [on, off] --maximizebutton [on, off] --sendtobottom Send To Bottom -o --openinexplorer Open File In Explorer -c --copytoclipboard Copy Window Text To Clipboard --copyscreenshot Copy Screenshot To Clipboard --clearclipboard Clear Clipboard --trustedinstaller Sets TrustedInstaller owner for SmartSystemMenuHook.dll and SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll -n --nogui No GUI Example: SmartSystemMenu.exe --title "Untitled - Notepad" -a topleft -p high --alwaysontop on --nogui ``` –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞ -------------------- * –°–∫–∞—á–∞–π—Ç–µ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω—é—é –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—é [SmartSystemMenu](https://github.com/AlexanderPro/SmartSystemMenu/releases) –≤ zip —Ñ–∞–π–ª–µ * [Chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org/): `choco install smartsystemmenu` * [Scoop](https://scoop.sh/): `scoop bucket add extras` –∏ `scoop install extras/smartsystemmenu` –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–µ -------------------- * –û–° Windows XP SP3 –∏ –≤—ã—à–µ. –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ x86 and x64 —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. * .NET Framework 4.0 –§–∞–π–ª—ã -------------------- * SmartSystemMenu.exe * SmartSystemMenu64.exe (–Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è –≤ —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–∞—Ö SmartSystemMenu.exe) * SmartSystemMenuHook.dll * SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll * SmartSystemMenu.xml * Language.xml –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–∞ —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç –∏–∑ SmartSystemMenu.exe and SmartSystemMenuHook.dll –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π –¥–ª—è x86 —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º, SmartSystemMenu64.exe –∏ SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll –º–æ–¥—É–ª–µ–π –¥–ª—è x64 —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –ö–æ–≥–¥–∞ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å SmartSystemMenu.exe, –æ–Ω —Ç–∞–∫ –∂–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç—É–µ—Ç SmartSystemMenu64.exe –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å. –≠—Ç–∏ –¥–≤–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞—é—Ç —Ö—É–∫–∏ (SmartSystemMenuHook.dll –∏ SmartSystemMenuHook64.dll) –≤–æ –≤—Å–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å—ã —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã. –ö–æ–≥–¥–∞ –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –æ–¥–∏–Ω –∏–∑ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—É–Ω–∫—Ç–æ–≤ –º–µ–Ω—é, —Ö—É–∫ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å—ã–ª–∞–µ—Ç –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é –æ–± —ç—Ç–æ–º –≤ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å SmartSystemMenu.exe (SmartSystemMenu64.exe) –∏ —É–∂–µ —Å–∞–º –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ. –ü—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏–µ -------------------- –ü—Ä–∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–µ SmartSystemMenu.exe –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –æ–∫–Ω–æ UAC, —Ç.–∫. –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É—é—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∏–ª–µ–≥–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞ –∫ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –æ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–∞—Ö –∏ –æ–∫–Ω–∞—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã.
